Package com.thalesgroup.gemalto.fido2.authenticator.passcode

Interface PasscodeAuthenticatorCallback

public interface PasscodeAuthenticatorCallback
A callback to show the keyboard UI and handle the Passcode enrollment/unenrollment events.

Methods called from this callback will inform the App layer of the outcome of these processes as well as to display the secure keyboard UI.

Note: All callbacks are invoked on the Main thread.

Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onError(Fido2Exception exception)
    Called when the Passcode operation completes with a failure.
    default void
    onStart(Keyboard keyboard, Fido2OperationInfo fido2OperationInfo, Controller controller)
    Called when a keyboard UI needs to be displayed.
    void

    Called when to set the PIN.

  • Method Details

    • onStart

      @MainThread default void onStart(Keyboard keyboard, Fido2OperationInfo fido2OperationInfo, Controller controller)
      Called when a keyboard UI needs to be displayed. This is an optional method. Implement this method to input the passcode using secure keypad. This is called on the main thread.
      Parameters:
      keyboard - Keyboard object that has a secure keyboard in a fragment that needs to be displayed for passcode entry
      fido2OperationInfo - object holds common information that the UI needs to display to the user
      controller - an object that can control the process.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - throws an exception when the implementation is not provided.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • setPasscode

      @MainThread default void setPasscode(boolean isChangePasscode, Fido2OperationInfo fido2OperationInfo, SetPasscodeCallback setPasscodeCallback)
      Called when to set the PIN. This is an optional method. Implement this method to set the passcode programmatically. This is called on the main thread.
      Parameters:
      isChangePasscode - true during change passcode operation, otherwise false.
      fido2OperationInfo - object holds common information that the UI needs to display to the user.
      setPasscodeCallback - a callback to provide the passcode.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - throws an exception when the implementation is not provided.
      Since:
      1.8.0

    • onSuccess

      @MainThread void onSuccess()
      Called when the Passcode operation completes successfully. No further callbacks will be issued.

      Note: This callback is NOT invoked during FIDO2 Registration/Authentication operations.

      Thread safety: called from main UI thread

      Since:
      1.0.0

    • onError

      @MainThread void onError(Fido2Exception exception)
      Called when the Passcode operation completes with a failure. No further callbacks will be issued.

      Note: This callback is NOT invoked during FIDO2 Registration/Authentication operations.

      Thread safety: called from main UI thread

      Parameters:
      exception - exception that specifies what went wrong.
      Since:
      1.0.0
